id.description: The unique identifier of the promotional credit record.

customer_id.description: The ID of the customer associated with the promotional credit.

type.description: The category or classification of the promotional credit.

amount_in_decimal.description: The decimal representation of the promotional credit amount.

currency_code.description: The currency code of the promotional credit.

description.description: Additional information or notes about the promotional credit.

reference.description: A reference related to the promotional credit.

closing_balance.description: The closing balance after using promotional credit.

done_by.description: The user who initiated the use of promotional credit.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the promotional credit was created.

custom_fields.description: Custom fields associated with the promotional credit.
